author: ritchiem
msg: SyncWaitDelay*Test is failing spuradically with a management port clash. Simplest solution here is to disable the management interface for these tests. The more complex change to ensure the MC is shut down correctly and port freed during test startup will not be a problem for production. It only occurs here as we start a broker then stop and start a new one immediately.

author: lhein
msg: fixed problem that pending uninstalled bundles waiting for deps will be started as soon as the deps are available. That led to an exception that the bundle was already uninstalled. Now the file monitor is watching for bundle uninstall events and will remove those bundles from the list of pending bundles.

author: jonesde
msg: Changed tree widget code to use plain space instead of nbsp in order to work better with the encoding, and not actually show the ampersand and semicolon; thanks to Marco for pointing this out
